com.perforce.p4java.impl.mapbased.rpc.sys.helper

Class TextNormalizationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.perforce.p4java.impl.mapbased.rpc.sys.helper.TextNormalizationHelper

  • public class TextNormalizationHelper
extends Object
    This helper class dynamically loads the "java.text.Normalizer" in JDK 6 or above using reflection. It provides the method normalize which transforms Unicode text into an equivalent composed or decomposed form. The normalize method supports the standard normalization forms described in Unicode Standard Annex #15 â€” Unicode Normalization Forms.
